cards.name: Public Service Delivery
cards.description: Providing essential government services such as civil registration, licensing, permits, and administrative documentation to support both residents and businesses across the Banadir Region.

cards.name: Urban Development & Infrastructure
cards.description: Overseeing city planning, road construction, sanitation, environmental maintenance, and public works to improve Mogadishu’s infrastructure and promote sustainable development.

cards.name: Security & Safety Management
cards.description: Working alongside security institutions to maintain peace, ensure public safety, and coordinate emergency responses throughout the Banadir Region.

cards.name: Community Welfare & Social Support

services.name: Public Service Delivery
services.description: BRA provides key administrative services such as civil registration, family certificates, business permits, construction licenses, and various legal and documentation services that support both residents and local enterprises.
docs: Any supporting documents required for the specific service

services.name: Urban Development & Infrastructure
services.description: The administration leads Mogadishu’s development projects including roads, drainage systems, sanitation operations, and city beautification initiatives aimed at improving quality of life.

services.name: Security & Safety Management
services.description: BRA collaborates with district authorities and national forces to maintain peace, enhance public safety, manage emergency response, and safeguard communities across all 17 districts.

services.name: Community Welfare & Social Support
services.description: Promoting social programs, humanitarian coordination, youth empowerment, women’s inclusion, and local community projects that support vulnerable populations and improve social well-being.
